Hi,

I don’t know how to say this – or what to even say. I don’t actually believe this letter will ever reach you, because that would be completely illogical. Nonetheless, I couldn’t shake off this need of corresponding with you, in any shape or form.

Letters are so antiquated, I know! But there’s something about the sheer physicality of it, the sound of the pencil scratching the surface of this salvaged paper piece, that entices me. Distracts from all this, brings me back to different times.

Forgive my only way of going back in time,

A
